text: The BYD Seal 07 DM-i, previously the BYD Seal DM-i until 2024 is a plug-in hybrid sedan made by BYD. It is part of BYD's "Ocean Series". == Overview == The Seal DM-i was previously named the Destroyer 07 and was planned to be a third model of the Warship series. In July 2023, Destroyer 07 was renamed to Seal DM-i.
